message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to compromise at $17000. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, let me know!
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm afraid I'll have to pass. I've found a better deal with another seller for $10000. I'll have to go with that option.
